dexPoolFind.createPoolAdvice: This pool does not exist! Please, create one now.

createPoolInfo.stable: Important: You are creating a market designed for correlated assets. Make sure that the tokens are pegged to the same asset, e.g., BUSD/USDC.
createPoolInfo.volatile: Important: You are creating a market designed for uncorrelated assets. E.g., BTC/ETH.
